page.title: 09SPECIAL SCHOOL IN HATFIELD
page.content: Built in 1981 Hatfield Chase School caters for approx 86 handicapped children with an age range 2-19 years and a range of disabilities. Situated on the same site as Hatfield High School and Ash Hill Middle School it is run by the local Education Authority. It has 15 teachers,some trained and some voluntary. On occasion nurses and pupils from the High School visit as part of their training. The Schools's facilities include 2 microcomputers, colour televisions, video recorders,swimming pool,and gymnasium. A Speech Therapist visits on a regular basis. Apart from normal outside activities, the children have the opportunity to go sailing and canoeing.
